item.title: Zookeeper Curator with SASL Digest-MD5
item.description: I finished a book recently about Apache Zookeeper and was playing around with various coordination tasks (Leader Election, Locks, etc) on my own time. I like to get hands-on when learning new technologies, so this book was a decent introduction to Zookeeper.
